00047 #define THEMEAPITYPE(f)                                 typedef HRESULT (__stdcall *_##f)
00048 #define THEMEAPITYPE_(t, f)                     typedef t (__stdcall *_##f)
00049 #define THEMEAPIPTR(f)                                  _##f m_p##f
00050 
00051 #ifdef XPSUPPORT
00052         #define THEMECALL(f)                                            return (*m_p##f)
00053         #define GETTHEMECALL(f)                                 m_p##f = (_##f)GetProcAddress(m_hThemeLib, #f)
00054 #else
00055         void ThemeDummy(...) {ASSERT(FALSE);}
00056         #define HTHEME                                                                  void*
00057         #define TABP_PANE                                                               0
00058         #define THEMECALL(f)                                            return 0; ThemeDummy
00059         #define GETTHEMECALL(f)                                 m_p##f = NULL
00060 #endif

00132 
00133 CThemeLib::CThemeLib()
00134 :       m_hThemeLib(NULL)
00135 {
00136 #ifdef XPSUPPORT
00137         m_hThemeLib = LoadLibrary(_T("uxtheme.dll"));
00138         if (!m_hThemeLib)
00139                 return;
00140 
00141         GETTHEMECALL(IsThemeActive);
00142         GETTHEMECALL(OpenThemeData);
00143         GETTHEMECALL(CloseThemeData);
00144         GETTHEMECALL(GetThemeBackgroundContentRect);
00145         GETTHEMECALL(DrawThemeBackground);
00146 #endif
00147 }
00148 
00149 
00150 CThemeLib::~CThemeLib()
00151 {
00152         if (m_hThemeLib)
00153                 FreeLibrary(m_hThemeLib);
00154 }

00156 
00157 BOOL CThemeLib::IsAvailable() const
00158 {
00159         return m_hThemeLib!=NULL;
00160 }

00190 BOOL CPropPageFrameDefault::Create(DWORD dwWindowStyle, const RECT &rect, CWnd *pwndParent, UINT nID)
00191 {
00192         return CWnd::Create(
00193                 AfxRegisterWndClass(CS_HREDRAW|CS_VREDRAW, AfxGetApp()->LoadStandardCursor(IDC_ARROW), GetSysColorBrush(COLOR_3DFACE)),
00194                 _T("Page Frame"),
00195                 dwWindowStyle, rect, pwndParent, nID);

00204 
00205 void CPropPageFrameDefault::SetCaption(LPCTSTR lpszCaption, HICON hIcon /*= NULL*/)
00206 {
00207         CPropPageFrame::SetCaption(lpszCaption, hIcon);
00208 
00209         // build image list
00210         if (m_Images.GetSafeHandle())
00211                 m_Images.DeleteImageList();
00212         if (hIcon)
00213         {
00214                 ICONINFO        ii;
00215                 if (!GetIconInfo(hIcon, &ii))
00216                         return;
00217 
00218                 CBitmap bmMask;
00219                 bmMask.Attach(ii.hbmMask);
00220                 if (ii.hbmColor) DeleteObject(ii.hbmColor);
00221 
00222                 BITMAP  bm;
00223                 bmMask.GetBitmap(&bm);
00224 
00225                 if (!m_Images.Create(bm.bmWidth, bm.bmHeight, ILC_COLOR32|ILC_MASK, 0, 1))
00226                         return;
00227 
00228                 if (m_Images.Add(hIcon) == -1)
00229                         m_Images.DeleteImageList();
00230         }
00231 }

00233 
00234 CRect CPropPageFrameDefault::CalcMsgArea()
00235 {
00236         CRect   rect;
00237         GetClientRect(rect);
00238         if (g_ThemeLib.IsAvailable() && g_ThemeLib.IsThemeActive())
00239         {
00240                 HTHEME  hTheme = g_ThemeLib.OpenThemeData(m_hWnd, L"Tab");
00241                 if (hTheme)
00242                 {
00243                         CRect   rectContent;
00244                         CDC             *pDc = GetDC();
00245                         g_ThemeLib.GetThemeBackgroundContentRect(hTheme, pDc->m_hDC, TABP_PANE, 0, rect, rectContent);
00246                         ReleaseDC(pDc);
00247                         g_ThemeLib.CloseThemeData(hTheme);
00248                         
00249                         if (GetShowCaption())
00250                                 rectContent.top = rect.top+GetCaptionHeight()+1;
00251                         rect = rectContent;
00252                 }
00253         }
00254         else if (GetShowCaption())
00255                 rect.top+= GetCaptionHeight()+1;
00256         
00257         return rect;
00258 }
00259 
00260 
00261 CRect CPropPageFrameDefault::CalcCaptionArea()
00262 {
00263         CRect   rect;
00264         GetClientRect(rect);
00265         if (g_ThemeLib.IsAvailable() && g_ThemeLib.IsThemeActive())
00266         {
00267                 HTHEME  hTheme = g_ThemeLib.OpenThemeData(m_hWnd, L"Tab");
00268                 if (hTheme)
00269                 {
00270                         CRect   rectContent;
00271                         CDC             *pDc = GetDC();
00272                         g_ThemeLib.GetThemeBackgroundContentRect(hTheme, pDc->m_hDC, TABP_PANE, 0, rect, rectContent);
00273                         ReleaseDC(pDc);
00274                         g_ThemeLib.CloseThemeData(hTheme);
00275                         
00276                         if (GetShowCaption())
00277                                 rectContent.bottom = rect.top+GetCaptionHeight();
00278                         else
00279                                 rectContent.bottom = rectContent.top;
00280 
00281                         rect = rectContent;
00282                 }
00283         }
00284         else
00285         {
00286                 if (GetShowCaption())
00287                         rect.bottom = rect.top+GetCaptionHeight();
00288                 else
00289                         rect.bottom = rect.top;
00290         }
00291 
00292         return rect;
00293 }
00294 
00295 void CPropPageFrameDefault::DrawCaption(CDC *pDc, CRect rect, LPCTSTR lpszCaption, HICON hIcon)
00296 {
00297         COLORREF        clrLeft = GetSysColor(COLOR_INACTIVECAPTION);
00298         COLORREF        clrRight = pDc->GetPixel(rect.right-1, rect.top);
00299         FillGradientRectH(pDc, rect, clrLeft, clrRight);
00300 
00301         // draw icon
00302         if (hIcon && m_Images.GetSafeHandle() && m_Images.GetImageCount() == 1)
00303         {
00304                 IMAGEINFO       ii;
00305                 m_Images.GetImageInfo(0, &ii);
00306                 CPoint          pt(3, rect.CenterPoint().y - (ii.rcImage.bottom-ii.rcImage.top)/2);
00307                 m_Images.Draw(pDc, 0, pt, ILD_TRANSPARENT);
00308                 rect.left+= (ii.rcImage.right-ii.rcImage.left) + 3;
00309         }
00310 
00311         // draw text
00312         rect.left+= 2;
00313 
00314         COLORREF        clrPrev = pDc->SetTextColor(GetSysColor(COLOR_CAPTIONTEXT));
00315         int                             nBkStyle = pDc->SetBkMode(TRANSPARENT);
00316         CFont                   *pFont = (CFont*)pDc->SelectStockObject(SYSTEM_FONT);
00317 
00318         pDc->DrawText(lpszCaption, rect, DT_LEFT|DT_VCENTER|DT_SINGLELINE|DT_END_ELLIPSIS);
00319 
00320         pDc->SetTextColor(clrPrev);
00321         pDc->SetBkMode(nBkStyle);
00322         pDc->SelectObject(pFont);
00323 }

00325 
00327 // Implementation helpers
00328 
00329 void CPropPageFrameDefault::FillGradientRectH(CDC *pDc, const RECT &rect, COLORREF clrLeft, COLORREF clrRight)
00330 {
00331         // pre calculation
00332         int     nSteps = rect.right-rect.left;
00333         int     nRRange = GetRValue(clrRight)-GetRValue(clrLeft);
00334         int     nGRange = GetGValue(clrRight)-GetGValue(clrLeft);
00335         int     nBRange = GetBValue(clrRight)-GetBValue(clrLeft);
00336 
00337         double  dRStep = (double)nRRange/(double)nSteps;
00338         double  dGStep = (double)nGRange/(double)nSteps;
00339         double  dBStep = (double)nBRange/(double)nSteps;
00340 
00341         double  dR = (double)GetRValue(clrLeft);
00342         double  dG = (double)GetGValue(clrLeft);
00343         double  dB = (double)GetBValue(clrLeft);
00344 
00345         CPen    *pPrevPen = NULL;
00346         for (int x = rect.left; x <= rect.right; ++x)
00347         {
00348                 CPen    Pen(PS_SOLID, 1, RGB((BYTE)dR, (BYTE)dG, (BYTE)dB));
00349                 pPrevPen = pDc->SelectObject(&Pen);
00350                 pDc->MoveTo(x, rect.top);
00351                 pDc->LineTo(x, rect.bottom);
00352                 pDc->SelectObject(pPrevPen);
00353                 
00354                 dR+= dRStep;
00355                 dG+= dGStep;
00356                 dB+= dBStep;
00357         }
00358 }

00370 
00371 BOOL CPropPageFrameDefault::OnEraseBkgnd(CDC* pDC) 
00372 {
00373         if (g_ThemeLib.IsAvailable() && g_ThemeLib.IsThemeActive())
00374         {
00375                 HTHEME  hTheme = g_ThemeLib.OpenThemeData(m_hWnd, L"Tab");
00376                 if (hTheme)
00377                 {
00378                         CRect   rect;
00379                         GetClientRect(rect);
00380                         g_ThemeLib.DrawThemeBackground(hTheme, pDC->m_hDC, TABP_PANE, 0, rect, NULL);
00381 
00382                         g_ThemeLib.CloseThemeData(hTheme);
00383                 }
00384                 return TRUE;
00385         }
00386         else
00387         {
00388                 return CWnd::OnEraseBkgnd(pDC);
00389         }
00390 }
